Text:
TamilRockers... This is not spoken language "ENGLISH". Do you have this is English? or English sub-titles? Thanks!!

 It really looks like this movie is a good movie, would love to see it in English...:)
Do not mislead people by writing english as spoken language. It is obvious this is tamil from the title itself unless it is dubbed in english.
Is the movie tamil dubbed or is it shooted in tamil..... coz eega is actuaaly a telugu movie... just a doubt...please reply
@sree10 : YES & NO. This movie was released in both languages at once.
Actualy, I guess shooted in both languages like the movie SAMURAI directed by Balaji Sakthivel
